com.hamweather.aeris.response

Class AerisFriendlyResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hamweather.aeris.response.AerisFriendlyResponse
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvisoriesResponse, CountriesResponse, EarthquakesResponse, FiresResponse, MoonphasesResponse, NormStationsResponse, ObservationResponse, PeriodsResponse, PlacesResponse, RecordsResponse, StormCellResponse, StormReportsResponse, SunmoonResponse, TideStationsResponse

    public abstract class AerisFriendlyResponse
extends Object
    Abstract class that helps allow access to the AerisDataJSON to determine what information is accessible to the AerisResponse.
